= 0.12) taken at RT is displayed in Fig. 3a. The
spectrum exhibits two resonant absorption lines which
can be evaluated by two quadrupole doublets. After sev-
eral attempts, it became clear that it was not possible to
obtain a satisfactory ﬁt of the spectrum using quadrupole
split doublets having simple Lorentzian line shapes.
Therefore, two quadrupole splitting distributions assuming
Voigt line shapes were used applying the ﬁt program
Recoil of Lagarec & Rancourt (1998). The ﬁt gives a
